title: Study Materials
content:
Supplementary Notes The following notes supplement the readings in the course textbook as described in the Readings section.
Notes for Lecture 8: One-sided Inverses (PDF)
Notes for Lectures 8 and 9: Gaussian Elimination (PDF)
Notes for Lectures 8, 10 and 13: Finite Fields (PDF)
Notes for Lecture 15: Orthogonal Bases (PDF)
Notes for Lecture 18: Proof of the Spectral Theorem (PDF)
Notes for Lectures 22 and 23: Generalized Eigenspaces (PDF)
There are two extra notes.
Some interesting bases (PDF)
Mathematical formalism of quantum mechanics (PDF)
